text: MINOR COMPLICATIONS MAJOR COMPLICATIONS Inadequate sedation/anaesthesia Cardiac arrest and/or death Post operative nausea and vomiting Unintended patient awareness Agitation/Delirium Vomiting and aspiration Inadequate post operative pain control Anaphylaxis Hemodynamic instability Need to escalate care Minor respiratory complications Hemodynamic instability Complications related to IV line placement Respiratory complications Need for opioid reversal Resuscitation Desaturation Nervous system injury Hypothermia Wrong patient/wrong site Fall or burn
